entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
